Policy.Name: AWS::IoT::Policy
Policy.Description: The JSON document that describes the policy.The name (the physical ID) of the AWS IoT policy.

Certificate.Name: AWS::IoT::Certificate
Certificate.Description:
The certificate signing request (CSR).The status of the certificate.Returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the instance profile. For
                     example:A value similar to the following is
                     returned:

PolicyPrincipalAttachment.Name: AWS::IoT::PolicyPrincipalAttachment
PolicyPrincipalAttachment.Description:
The name of the policy.The principal, which can be a certificate ARN (as returned from the
                     CreateCertificate operation) or an Amazon Cognito ID.

Thing.Name: AWS::IoT::Thing
Thing.Description:
A JSON string that contains up to three key-value pairs, for example: {
                     "attributes": { "string1":"string2" } }.The name (the physical ID) of the AWS IoT thing.

TopicRule.Name: AWS::IoT::TopicRule
TopicRule.Description: The name (the physical ID) of the AWS IoT rule.The actions associated with the AWS IoT rule.

ThingPrincipalAttachment.Name: AWS::IoT::ThingPrincipalAttachment
ThingPrincipalAttachment.Description:
The principal, which can be a certificate ARN (as returned from the
                     CreateCertificate operation) or an Amazon Cognito ID.The name of the AWS IoT thing.
